comment: "Was substantially revised by editor, and not bylined, both unanticipated. Cordial relationship.."
"Paid on acceptance. Heavily factual & fact-checked, based on l-t knowledge&research"
relationship: Referral (you had a connection who connected you to the editor)

comment: "Editors are easy to work with, long-term pros in the market, but the fact-checking is something to get used to. Not a problem, just different from most publications in this price range. But they pay well and on time. "
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication
